SELECT b.book_isbn, b.book_name, b.book_price, b.book_publisher, b.book_author, b.book_publish_date, b.book_state, b.book_qty, COUNT(DISTINCT co.order_num) AS order_count, COUNT(r.review_rating) AS review_rating_cnt, NVL(TRUNC(SUM(r.review_rating) / COUNT(r.review_rating), 2), 0) AS reviews_rating_avg, b.book_thumbnail_changed FROM books b LEFT JOIN customer_order_details cod ON b.book_isbn = cod.book_isbn LEFT JOIN reviews r ON cod.order_detail_num = r.order_detail_num LEFT JOIN customer_orders co ON cod.order_num = co.order_num WHERE b.book_deleted = '01' and (co.order_payment_status = '01' OR co.order_payment_status IS NULL)
and REPLACE(LOWER(b.book_name), ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(LOWER(#{word}), ' ', '') || '%'
and REPLACE(LOWER(b.book_author), ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(LOWER(#{word}), ' ', '') || '%'
and REPLACE(LOWER(b.book_publisher), ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(LOWER(#{word}), ' ', '') || '%'
and b.book_category = (SELECT category_name FROM book_categorys WHERE category_num = #{search_field})
GROUP BY b.book_isbn, b.book_name, b.book_price, b.book_publisher, b.book_author, b.book_thumbnail_changed, b.book_publish_date, b.book_state, b.book_qty
